messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 115
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I m just gonna hafta do a search online for more Loretto Chapel info. Got me going again!! I m glad they figured out who the guy was....that part makes
messages.messageBody:
Well, I'm just gonna hafta do a search online for more Loretto Chapel info.
Got me going again!!
I'm glad they figured out who the guy was....that part makes sense. But what
about the design? Did he talk about that in his journal?
And the type of wood he used, they could't figure out what it was.
Or were they just hyping the story to turn it into a "Miracle".???
More questions.
I'll just quit for now, I'm probably boring everyone. That place really drew
me though...the whole Santa Fe experience did. I love listening to Ottmar
Leibert's guitar music because it reminds me of it.
Ren, yearning to travel....
